name: Plant Boy
description:
A short game made for Ludum Dare 46

Play as a plant boy and plant some little plant boys as any good plant boy would do.

- plant the seedlings in the pots
- grow the seedlings by watering them
- you can only water the plants again once the growth bar has stopped
- don't pick up the plants while they are growing or you will have to water them again
- once fully grown, pack seedlings onto truck

Controls:

Mouse / Keyboard
Move - WASD
Pickup / Drop - Left Click
Use - Right Click
Restart - Escape

Controller
Move - Left Stick
Pickup / Drop - Left Bumper
Use - Right Bumper
Restart - Select
